text: Granulifusus captivus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Hadorn R. & Fraussen K. 2005. Revision of the genus Granulifusus Kuroda & Habe 1954 with description of some new species (Gastropoda: Prosobranchia: Fasciolariidae). Archiv für Molluskenkunde 134 (2): 129–171. Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1889
title: Granulifusus captivus
